mainText: I remember as an artist going to college and discovering Macs and how they were going to revolutionize graphic design.  I received my first Mac as a gift but the real power came when the redesign of Macs were introduced.  I bought the first iMac with the swivel top and an iPod as well.  I have not looked back since.  Knowing how much Steve Jobs had a hand in this technology is humbling and inspiring all at the same time.  Thank you Steve for giving the  world so much of your mind and it is that much sadder that you are not here to give more.
author: Nicholas
